name: Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping car.
scenarioId: add-products-to-a-shopping-car:Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping car.
methodName: Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping car.

testSteps.description: 1: Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping car. ({Category=Dormitorio, Subcategory=Cabeceros})

children.description: Given the user is in the Exito shopping page.
User opens the Exito home page
When the user select a category "Dormitorio" and a subcategory "Cabeceros".
User select category and subcategory
User clicks on Menu button
User clicks on Category Dormitorio
User clicks on SubCategory Cabeceros
And adds five random products with an aleatory quantity between 1-10.
User select products
User clicks on [By.xpath: //*[@id='gallery-layout-container']/div[2]/section/a/article/div[2]/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div/div]
User clicks on Add product button
User clicks on Add more units button
User clicks on Continue with shopping button
User clicks on [By.xpath: //*[@id='gallery-layout-container']/div[4]/section/a/article/div[2]/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div/div]
User clicks on Add product button

User clicks on Add product button

  I want to choose different products and add them to the shopping cart.

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is in the Exito shopping page.
When the user select a category "<Category>" and a subcategory "<Subcategory>".
And adds five random products with an aleatory quantity between 1-10.
Then the name, total price, quantity and the number of the products in the shopping have to be the same as the selected products
